lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert. January 31, 2014. The employees of BWD (Blumencranz, Wilkins and Dubofsky) are stunned and deeply saddened by the loss of our friend and colleague. Bob was a driving force at BWD and will be deeply missed by all. Bob and his son Ned joined BWD more than two decades ago and worked with many of us over the years. We can't imagine BWD without Bob. Our heartfelt sympathy goes out to his wife Betsy, to his son and partner Ned and wife Lyndsay, and all of Bob's family.
